ValidationRule.description: Makes Client Support Notes required when Contribution Type = Wrong Account
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Record_Type_Name__c = '401k Incoming Checks and ACHs',ISPICKVAL(Contribution_Type__c,'Wrong Account'), ISBLANK(Client_Support_Notes__c),NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Client Support Notes are required when Contribution Type is 'Wrong Account'
